name: Rod Rocket
description:
A thrust-style side scrolling rocket game. Harvest materials, fire rockets, trade goods, add to the level, fight the bad guys and save up to buy the most bad-ass ship you can.

This game is in a deep alpha state, and currently exists as a platform to show what this game is like to play. There is not a lot of level to play as of it and is somewhat "pointless", but is indeed fun to play around in.

If you have any feedback whatsoever I would be appreciative. The game is in a very early stage and am still in the air a bit about what direction I want to take it, a lot will come down to what works, what doesn't, and not needlessly making the game more complicated than it needs to be.

The suggestion of $2 is simply to help me develop this game. I don't have a lot of spare money to put into this or buying tools, and every bit helps, even simply as motivation to keep going. Thankyou

@rodtronics

rodtronics.tumblr.com

rodtronicsnz@gmail.com

UPDATE 11/1/14

Added tutorial level to begin with. Does away with most of what the readme tells you. Still the same though
